Game: Sonic X- Volume 1 Two of your favorite episodes from the Sonic the Hedgehog animated series arrive on the Game Boy Advance. Sonic X: Volume 1 includes "Chaos Control Freaks" and "Sonic to the Rescue." In "Chaos Control Freaks," Dr. Eggman blasts Sonic into a world where Sonic is the target of a high-speed police squad. In "Sonic to the Rescue," Sonic and Chuck attempt to rescue Cream and Cheese from a top secret military base filled with booby traps. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/43a31074-3ad3-4df1-8c80-b0fe823e737f.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/21d92bf2-4f20-46f6-9618-4c563995e02c.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/57d5389c-252e-4b00-abc3-ee250a1bfafb.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/f75272da-54aa-4f5d-97a0-64f4cac41069.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/de7751b0-d784-45ec-8acb-eec53ec1bb85.png
